about_the_game:
This Demo is the prototype for the upcoming open-world adult RPG Wild Life.

Get the first taste of the planet Kerpal and meet some of the wonderfully alluring characters of Wild Life.

Kerpal is a tempting land, with deep mesmerizing jungles, waterfalls, steep canyons, and sandy beaches. But don't let the beautiful landscapes trick you, Kerpal is a dangerous place. With secrets to uncover about its past and impending future.

In this demo you can play the lead as Max, exploring the lush wild planet and lucky for you, the Fest of Friendship is in full swing. Join in taking part in an old fun tradition to meet new people and make friends. Play your cards right and you might get a ribbon, make mistakes and you can get struck out.

In an immersive RPG environment, Wild Life gives you the opportunity to engage in visually stunning combat and even more stunning sexual interactions, with details never seen before.

KEY FEATURES

  • Combat: Survive enemies using bows, knives or guns.
  • Quests with backstory and unique characters.
  • Stunning visuals and landscape.

EXPLICIT SCENES

  • Skip or watch the full detailed intimate scenes.
  • Change and adjust camera angles.
  • Prototype interactions during scenes between characters.

RPG FEATURES

  • Collect items and idols.
  • Get crucial information from NPCs.
  • Open-world feel: walk freely and uncover the land.


We are thrilled to release this demo to showcase this wonderful land filled with all our desires. Play through and follow our project to keep up with the progress.

This game would have not been possible without the support of the Wild Life community to whom we dedicate this demo.

BACKSTORY

Eons ago a colonist ship crashed onto Kerpal, a faraway planet in the Outer Worlds. The passengers that survived, lived in isolation, developing into a neolithic-like culture, and adapted well to the dangers of their new home.


Unexpectedly, parts of the population transformed, turning into new beings that appeared part human, part animal. This drove some of them into a feral rage while others kept their humane traits and were able to coexist with the human tribes.
Maya is a unique Kerpali, a warrior that can appear fully human but can take flight with her wings.

Centuries later a group of adventurers and scientists are coming to Kerpal in search of discovery. But not all of these explorers came along out of curiosity. Some have darker motives. Among them, Max is in his first-ever expedition, loyal to the job and wide-eyed he will be challenged by unexpected circumstances.

Max and Maya must navigate these dark natural and human challenges as they determine who they can trust and whose animalistic instincts have gotten the better of them, posing grave danger to them and others on Kerpal.

In this demo, you will get the feel for the world, the characters, and the kerpali culture - which has evolved differently and more freely than those in the Inner world.
